dimension: 7 1/2 x 7 3/16 x 7/8 in. (19 x 18.3 x 2.2 cm) (without strap)
title: Diviner's Bag
description: small leather bag with flap; beaded on front with face-like decoration with raised nose and eyes; strap attached, consisting of beaded tubes with clusters of strung beads between; three large blue beads on strap  one at each end where strap attaches to bag and one in center of strap
creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
